Line13.53D3D: Yes. Our people are starving, going hungry while the goatmen overrun our farms. These lands used to be protected, but... well, we've no time now for this chatter.
Line17.53D3D: From my readings, I was able to see their attack on Kealer farm, nearby. I sensed a survivor. Hurry! Find them.
Line19.53D3D: Learn what you can, then return to me. I hope it's not too late.
